message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1100000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000 for your product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $950000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $1050000 is my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider other options.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position and respect the value you place on your product. I would like to make a counteroffer of $1000000 for your product.
